name: grr_huntresults_ts
description:
Download the results of a GRR hunt and process them.

- Collect results of a hunt given its Hunt ID
- Processes results with a local install of plaso
- Exports processed items to a new Timesketch sketch
short_description: Fetches the findings of a GRR hunt, processes them with plaso, and sends the results to Timesketch.
args: ID of GRR Hunt results to fetch
Reason for exporting hunt (used for Timesketch description)
Whether to verify the certificate provided by the Timesketch endpoint.
Sketch to which the timeline should be added
Authentication mode to use on Timesketch {timesketch,http-basic}
Whether to verify the GRR TLS certificate
